title: Day 1250
content:
Day 1250

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*AdGZx0uvdsVZm9hRL5_nJQ@2x.jpeg)

Save in sats, do hard stuff, practice gratitude for all your blessings.

If you want a great life it's that simple!

But sometimes the hardest thing to do is the simple one.

I always go back to that Fidelity study where the best performing portfolios were that of dead people. And now with Bitcoin you don't even need to take on the operational risk of a business.

You can simply save in the hardest money ever created.

It's really that simple.

8/23/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
